articles.description: Since stepping away from his position at Minnesota in October 2015 due to his health, Kill has gone out of his way to tear down the program he still claims he built from the ground up.
articles.content:
Thursday night’s Gophers football opener at Huntington Bank Stadium probably won’t be very close. At least it shouldn’t be.
Minnesota is a 36.5-point favorite over New Mexico State, a massive spread… [+3570 chars]
